title: Harmony Hub
description: A web application designed to help users with tinnitus reconnect emotionally with music using customizable audio presets and a real-time EQ interface. Led UX research and feature planning as PM.

title: HRIS DEI Analytics
description: A human resources information system (HRIS) dashboard designed to uncover pay disparities across gender, race, and sexuality. Led research on DEI gaps, contributed to roadmap planning, and proposed reporting and feedback tools to drive organizational equity.

title: Husky Habitat
description: An interactive student housing finder built with React and Leaflet. Defined MVP, managed dev sprints, and drove design decisions based on student feedback.
